actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: Resolution to disapprove of the Final System Plan prepared by the United States Railway Association and submitted to the House of Representatives on July 26, 1975.

summary.text: Expresses the House of Representatives disapproval of the Final System Plan prepared by the United States Railway Association and submitted to the House of Representatives on July 26, 1975.

titles.title: Resolution to disapprove of the Final System Plan prepared by the United States Railway Association and submitted to the House of Representatives on July 26, 1975.
